Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Exceptions
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    akka.http.scaladsl.marshallers.sprayjson.SprayJsonByteStringParserInput
    Will be made private. Since 10.0.2.
    akka.http.scaladsl.marshallers.sprayjson.SprayJsonByteStringParserInput$
    Not needed any more. Should have been private. Since 10.0.2.
  • Deprecated Exceptions 
    Exceptions and Description
    akka.http.impl.engine.HttpConnectionTimeoutException
    Not used. Will be replaced by `akka.stream.impl.io.TcpIdleTimeoutException` in Akka itself. Since 10.0.1.
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    akka.http.javadsl.model.headers.EntityTagRange.ALL
    because of troublesome initialisation order (with regards to scaladsl class implementing this class). In some edge cases this field could end up containing a null value. Will be removed in Akka HTTP 11.x, use EntityTagRanges.ALL instead.
    akka.http.javadsl.model.headers.HttpEncodingRange.ALL
    because of troublesome initialisation order (with regards to scaladsl class implementing this class). In some edge cases this field could end up containing a null value. Will be removed in Akka HTTP 11.x, use HttpEncodingRanges.ALL instead.
    akka.http.javadsl.model.headers.LanguageRange.ALL
    because of troublesome initialisation order (with regards to scaladsl class implementing this class). In some edge cases this field could end up containing a null value. Will be removed in Akka HTTP 11.x, use LanguageRanges.ALL instead.
    akka.http.javadsl.model.headers.HttpOriginRange.ALL
    because of troublesome initialisation order (with regards to scaladsl class implementing this class). In some edge cases this field could end up containing a null value. Will be removed in Akka HTTP 11.x, use HttpEncodingRanges.ALL instead.
    akka.http.javadsl.model.HttpEntity.EMPTY
    Will be removed in Akka HTTP 11.x, use HttpEntities.EMPTY instead.
    akka.http.javadsl.model.RemoteAddress.UNKNOWN
    because of troublesome initialisation order (with regards to scaladsl class implementing this class). In some edge cases this field could end up containing a null value. Will be removed in Akka HTTP 11.x, use RemoteAddresses.UNKNOWN instead.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    akka.http.scaladsl.model.HttpEntity$.apply(ContentType, File, int)
    Use `fromPath` instead. Since 2.4.5.
    akka.http.javadsl.Http.bind(ConnectHttp, Materializer)
    in favor of method that doesn't require materializer. You can just remove the materializer argument.
    akka.http.javadsl.Http.bind(ConnectHttp, ServerSettings, LoggingAdapter, Materializer)
    in favor of method that doesn't require materializer. You can just remove the materializer argument.
    akka.http.javadsl.Http.bind(ConnectHttp, ServerSettings, Materializer)
    in favor of method that doesn't require materializer. You can just remove the materializer argument.
    akka.http.scaladsl.HttpExt.bind(String, int, ConnectionContext, ServerSettings, LoggingAdapter, Materializer)
    Binary compatibility method. Use the new `bind` method without the implicit materializer instead. Since 10.0.11.
    akka.http.javadsl.Http.cachedHostConnectionPool(ConnectHttp, ConnectionPoolSettings, LoggingAdapter, Materializer)
    in favor of cachedHostConnectionPoolHttps that doesn't require an Materializer argument.
    akka.http.javadsl.Http.cachedHostConnectionPool(ConnectHttp, Materializer)
    in favor of method that doesn't require materializer. You can just remove the materializer argument.
    akka.http.scaladsl.HttpExt.cachedHostConnectionPool(String, int, ConnectionPoolSettings, LoggingAdapter, Materializer)
    Deprecated in favor of method without implicit materializer. Since 10.0.11.
    akka.http.javadsl.Http.cachedHostConnectionPool(String, Materializer)
    in favor of method that doesn't require materializer. You can just remove the materializer argument.
    akka.http.scaladsl.HttpExt.cachedHostConnectionPoolHttps(String, int, HttpsConnectionContext, ConnectionPoolSettings, LoggingAdapter, Materializer)
    Deprecated in favor of method without implicit materializer. Since 10.0.11.
    akka.http.javadsl.model.HttpEntities.create(ContentType, File)
    Will be removed in Akka HTTP 11.x, use HttpEntities.create(ContentType, Path) instead.
    akka.http.javadsl.model.HttpEntities.create(ContentType, File, int)
    Will be removed in Akka HTTP 11.x, use HttpEntities.create(ContentType, Path, int) instead.
    akka.http.javadsl.model.headers.HttpChallenge.create(String, String)
    Use constructor with optional realm parameter instead.
    akka.http.javadsl.model.headers.HttpChallenge.create(String, String, Map<String, String>)
    Use constructor with optional realm parameter instead.
    akka.http.javadsl.model.HttpMethods.custom(String, boolean, boolean, RequestEntityAcceptance)
    Use HttpMethods.createCustom(java.lang.String, boolean, boolean, akka.http.javadsl.model.RequestEntityAcceptance) instead.
    akka.http.scaladsl.coding.Decoder.decode(T, DataMapper<T>)
    Use Decoder#decodeMessage instead. No need for implicit mapper. Since 10.0.6.
    akka.http.scaladsl.coding.Encoder.encode(T, DataMapper<T>)
    Use Decoder#encodeMessage instead. No need for implicit mapper. Since 10.0.6.
    akka.http.javadsl.unmarshalling.Unmarshaller$.entityToMultipartByteRanges()
    Use `entityToMultipartByteRangesUnmarshaller` instead. This method leaks a Scala DSL class. Since 10.0.1.
    akka.http.javadsl.unmarshalling.Unmarshaller.entityToMultipartByteRanges()
    Use `entityToMultipartByteRangesUnmarshaller` instead. This method leaks a Scala DSL class. Since 10.0.1.
    akka.http.javadsl.unmarshalling.Unmarshaller$.entityToUrlEncodedFormData()
    Use `entityToWwwUrlEncodedFormData` instead. This method leaks a Scala DSL class. Since 10.0.1.
    akka.http.javadsl.unmarshalling.Unmarshaller.entityToUrlEncodedFormData()
    Use `entityToWwwUrlEncodedFormData` instead. This method leaks a Scala DSL class. Since 10.0.1.
    akka.http.scaladsl.server.directives.FormFieldDirectives.LowLevelFieldDefImplicits.forNDR(Unmarshaller<HttpEntity, StrictForm>, Unmarshaller<Option<StrictForm.Field>, T>)
    Customizing FromEntityUnmarshaller[StrictForm] is not supported any more. Use variant without the implicit SFU. Since 10.0.11.
    akka.http.scaladsl.server.directives.FormFieldDirectives.LowLevelFieldDefImplicits.forNDUR(Unmarshaller<HttpEntity, StrictForm>)
    Customizing FromEntityUnmarshaller[StrictForm] is not supported any more. Use variant without the implicit SFU. Since 10.0.11.
    akka.http.scaladsl.server.directives.FormFieldDirectives.LowLevelFieldDefImplicits.forNOR(Unmarshaller<HttpEntity, StrictForm>, Unmarshaller<Option<StrictForm.Field>, T>)
    Customizing FromEntityUnmarshaller[StrictForm] is not supported any more. Use variant without the implicit SFU. Since 10.0.11.
    akka.http.scaladsl.server.directives.FormFieldDirectives.LowLevelFieldDefImplicits.forNOUR(Unmarshaller<HttpEntity, StrictForm>)
    Customizing FromEntityUnmarshaller[StrictForm] is not supported any more. Use variant without the implicit SFU. Since 10.0.11.
    akka.http.scaladsl.server.directives.FormFieldDirectives.LowLevelFieldDefImplicits.forNR(Unmarshaller<HttpEntity, StrictForm>, Unmarshaller<StrictForm.Field, T>)
    Customizing FromEntityUnmarshaller[StrictForm] is not supported any more. Use variant without the implicit SFU. Since 10.0.11.
    akka.http.scaladsl.server.directives.FormFieldDirectives.LowLevelFieldDefImplicits.forNUR(Unmarshaller<HttpEntity, StrictForm>)
    Customizing FromEntityUnmarshaller[StrictForm] is not supported any more. Use variant without the implicit SFU. Since 10.0.11.
    akka.http.scaladsl.server.directives.FormFieldDirectives.LowLevelFieldDefImplicits.forRepVDR(Unmarshaller<HttpEntity, StrictForm>)
    Customizing FromEntityUnmarshaller[StrictForm] is not supported any more. Use variant without the implicit SFU. Since 10.0.11.
    akka.http.scaladsl.server.directives.FormFieldDirectives.LowLevelFieldDefImplicits.forRepVR(Unmarshaller<HttpEntity, StrictForm>, Unmarshaller<StrictForm.Field, T>)
    Customizing FromEntityUnmarshaller[StrictForm] is not supported any more. Use variant without the implicit SFU. Since 10.0.11.
    akka.http.scaladsl.server.directives.FormFieldDirectives.LowLevelFieldDefImplicits.forRVDR(Unmarshaller<HttpEntity, StrictForm>)
    Customizing FromEntityUnmarshaller[StrictForm] is not supported any more. Use variant without the implicit SFU. Since 10.0.11.
    akka.http.scaladsl.server.directives.FormFieldDirectives.LowLevelFieldDefImplicits.forRVR(Unmarshaller<HttpEntity, StrictForm>, Unmarshaller<StrictForm.Field, T>)
    Customizing FromEntityUnmarshaller[StrictForm] is not supported any more. Use variant without the implicit SFU. Since 10.0.11.
    akka.http.scaladsl.server.directives.FormFieldDirectives.LowLevelFieldDefImplicits.forString(Unmarshaller<HttpEntity, StrictForm>, Unmarshaller<StrictForm.Field, String>)
    Customizing FromEntityUnmarshaller[StrictForm] is not supported any more. Use variant without the implicit SFU. Since 10.0.11.
    akka.http.scaladsl.server.directives.FormFieldDirectives.LowLevelFieldDefImplicits.forSymbol(Unmarshaller<HttpEntity, StrictForm>, Unmarshaller<StrictForm.Field, String>)
    Customizing FromEntityUnmarshaller[StrictForm] is not supported any more. Use variant without the implicit SFU. Since 10.0.11.
    akka.http.javadsl.marshalling.Marshaller$.fromDataToEntity()
    Use `formDataToEntity` instead. Since 10.0.10.
    akka.http.javadsl.marshalling.Marshaller.fromDataToEntity()
    Use `formDataToEntity` instead. Since 10.0.10.
    akka.http.scaladsl.marshalling.LowPriorityToResponseMarshallerImplicits.fromEntityStreamingSupportAndEntityMarshaller(EntityStreamingSupport, Marshaller<T, RequestEntity>)
    This method exists only for the purpose of binary compatibility, it used to be implicit. Since 10.0.2.
    akka.http.scaladsl.model.Multipart.FormData$.fromFile(String, ContentType, File, int)
    Use `fromPath` instead. Since 2.4.5.
    akka.http.scaladsl.model.Multipart.FormData$.BodyPart$.fromFile(String, ContentType, File, int)
    Use `fromPath` instead. Since 2.4.5.
    akka.http.javadsl.ConnectionContext.getDefaultPort()
    'default-http-port' and 'default-https-port' configuration properties are used instead. Since 10.0.11.
    akka.http.scaladsl.model.HttpEntity$.limitableByteSource(Source<ByteString, Mat>)
    Not needed explicitly any more. . Since 10.1.5.
    akka.http.scaladsl.model.HttpEntity$.limitableChunkSource(Source<HttpEntity.ChunkStreamPart, Mat>)
    Not needed explicitly any more. . Since 10.1.5.
    akka.http.javadsl.model.HttpMethod.requestEntityAcceptance()
    Use HttpMethod.getRequestEntityAcceptance() instead, which returns RequestEntityAcceptance.
    akka.http.javadsl.Http.serverLayer(Materializer)
    in favor of method that doesn't require materializer. You can just remove the materializer argument.
    akka.http.scaladsl.HttpExt.serverLayer(Materializer)
    Binary compatibility method. Use the new `serverLayer` method without the implicit materializer instead. Since 10.0.11.
    akka.http.javadsl.Http.serverLayer(ServerSettings, Materializer)
    in favor of method that doesn't require materializer. You can just remove the materializer argument.
    akka.http.scaladsl.HttpExt.serverLayer(ServerSettings, Option<InetSocketAddress>, LoggingAdapter, boolean, Materializer)
    Binary compatibility method. Use the new `serverLayer` method without the implicit materializer instead. Since 10.0.11.
    akka.http.scaladsl.HttpExt.serverLayer(ServerSettings, Option<InetSocketAddress>, LoggingAdapter, Materializer)
    Binary compatibility method. Invocations should (automatically) use overloaded variant with default parameters. Since 10.0.11.
    akka.http.javadsl.Http.serverLayer(ServerSettings, Optional<InetSocketAddress>, LoggingAdapter, Materializer)
    in favor of method that doesn't require materializer. You can just remove the materializer argument.
    akka.http.javadsl.Http.serverLayer(ServerSettings, Optional<InetSocketAddress>, Materializer)
    in favor of method that doesn't require materializer. You can just remove the materializer argument.
    akka.http.javadsl.HostConnectionPool.shutdown(ExecutionContextExecutor)
    In favor of shutdown method that takes no executor.
    akka.http.scaladsl.Http.HostConnectionPool.shutdown(ExecutionContextExecutor)
    In favor of method that takes no execution context. Since 10.1.0.
    akka.http.javadsl.Http.singleRequest(HttpRequest, HttpsConnectionContext, ConnectionPoolSettings, LoggingAdapter, Materializer)
    in favor of method that doesn't require materializer. You can just remove the materializer argument.
    akka.http.scaladsl.HttpExt.singleRequest(HttpRequest, HttpsConnectionContext, ConnectionPoolSettings, LoggingAdapter, Materializer)
    Deprecated in favor of method without implicit materializer. Since 10.0.11.
    akka.http.javadsl.Http.singleRequest(HttpRequest, HttpsConnectionContext, Materializer)
    in favor of method that doesn't require materializer. You can just remove the materializer argument.
    akka.http.javadsl.Http.singleRequest(HttpRequest, Materializer)
    in favor of method that doesn't require materializer. You can just remove the materializer argument.
    akka.http.javadsl.Http.superPool(ConnectionPoolSettings, HttpsConnectionContext, LoggingAdapter, Materializer)
    in favor of method that doesn't require materializer. You can just remove the materializer argument.
    akka.http.javadsl.Http.superPool(ConnectionPoolSettings, LoggingAdapter, Materializer)
    in favor of method that doesn't require materializer. You can just remove the materializer argument.
    akka.http.scaladsl.HttpExt.superPool(HttpsConnectionContext, ConnectionPoolSettings, LoggingAdapter, Materializer)
    Deprecated in favor of method without implicit materializer. Since 10.0.11.
    akka.http.javadsl.Http.superPool(Materializer)
    in favor of method that doesn't require materializer. You can just remove the materializer argument.
    akka.http.javadsl.model.Multipart.toEntity(HttpCharset, String)
    This variant of `toEntity` is not supported any more. The charset parameter will be ignored. Please use the variant without specifying the charset.
    akka.http.javadsl.model.Multipart.Strict.toEntity(HttpCharset, String)
    This variant of `toEntity` is not supported any more. The charset parameter will be ignored. Please use the variant without specifying the charset.
    akka.http.scaladsl.model.Multipart.toEntity(HttpCharset, String)
    This variant of toEntity is not supported any more. The charset parameter will be ignored. Please use one of the other overloads instead.
    akka.http.scaladsl.model.Multipart.toEntity(HttpCharset, String, LoggingAdapter)
    This variant of toEntity is not supported any more. The charset parameter will be ignored. Please use one of the other overloads instead.
    akka.http.javadsl.unmarshalling.Unmarshaller.unmarshall(A, ExecutionContext, Materializer)
    Use unmarshal instead. Since 10.0.2.
    akka.http.scaladsl.server.directives.FileUploadDirectives.uploadedFile(String)
    Deprecated in favor of storeUploadedFile which allows to specify a file to store the upload in. Since 10.0.11.
    akka.http.javadsl.server.directives.FileUploadDirectives.uploadedFile(String, BiFunction<FileInfo, File, Route>)
    in favor of storeUploadedFile which allows to specify a file to store the upload in
    akka.http.javadsl.model.HttpMessage.MessageTransformations.withEntity(ContentType, File)
    Will be removed in Akka HTTP 11.x, use HttpMessage.MessageTransformations.withEntity(ContentType, Path) instead.
    akka.http.scaladsl.model.HttpMessage.withEntity(ContentType, File)
    Use withEntity(ContentType, Path) instead. Since 2.4.5.
